snippet: The Jets have returned to Rex Ryan’s philosophy of a running game identity by averaging 140 yards rushing in the past three games.
abstract: New York Jets have returned to coach Rex Ryan's philosophy of a running game identity by averaging 140 yards rushing in past three games.
lead_paragraph: The Jets have returned to Rex Ryan’s philosophy of a running game identity by averaging 140 yards rushing in the past three games.

headline.seo: Jets’ Focus Returns to Ground Game, Not Quarterback Issues
headline.main: Jets’ Focus Returns to Ground Game
